1403630.name: The Dungeon Of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet Of Chaos - Goodies Pack
1403630.description:
The Dungeon of Naheulbeuk: The Amulet of Choas - Goodies Pack contains :

Digital Artbook

124 pages of arts and early sketches created to make the game

Extra Music Tracks

5 new tracks composed by John Lang AKA Pen Of Chaos !

  • Intermede at the Elves'
  • Heavy casualties
  • Zangdar's office
  • Blood sucker
  • They're gonna spit their teeth

Artworks

5 new exclusive high-resolution artworks

Animated Artworks

5 exclusive Animated Artworks

Audio Lines

Pack of audio lines from the game characters in EN, FR & DE
1403630.supported_languages:
英语*, 法语*, 德语*, 简体中文
*具有完全音频支持的语言
